Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: (Khankanya) nalowo wabugcinayo ubunyulu bakhe (uMaryam), Thina ke Savuthela okomoya wethu kuye4 Saza Samenza yena nonyana wakhe baba ngumqondiso endalweni
Inene esi sizwe senu yinkolo enye yaye Mna ndiyiNkosi yenu, khonzani Mna ke
Kodwa baqhekeka bahlukana phakathi kwabo ngokuphathelene nenkolo yabo. (Kanti) baza kubuyela kuThi bonke
Ke kaloku lowo wenza izenzo ezilungileyo lo gama ekholwa, imizamo yakhe ayiyi kuphikwa, yaye inene Thina SingabaBhali bayo
Akuvumelekanga nasiphi na isixeko kwesazitshabalalisayo ukuba zingaphinda zibuyele (ebomini) kwakhona
De uYa’jûj (uGogi) noMa’jûj (uMagogi) bakhululwe baze behle kuzo zonke iinduli

Ke kaloku isithembiso senene siza kuya sisondela, kananjalo niya kuwabona amehlo abangakholwayo ejamile ndlaa ngoloyiko (besithi): “Yeha kuthi! Inene thina zanga sikunanze oku nakanye thina sasingabenzi bobubi.”
Inene nina bangakholwayo noko nikunqulayo ngaphandle koAllâh, niya kuba ziinkuni (zoMlilo) wesiHogo yaye niya kungeniswa kuso
Ukuba ngaba ezi zithixo bezingoothixo (bokwenyani) bebengazi kungeniswa kuso (isiHogo), yaye bonke baya kuhlala apho kuso (ngonaphakade)
Kuso, apho baya kuphefumla ngesingqala nomgqumo ukanti phakathi apho abayi kuva nto (ngeendlebe)
Inene bona abo umvuzo wabo olungileyo uya kuba uphumile kuThi. Ke bona kuwo (uMlilo wesiHogo) baya kususwa babe kude lee
